籤詩版本二:
Ubumnene buye banqoba amandla kusukela kudala, futhi umnyango wezenzo ezinhle uyachuma.
Uma othile ebhula le-hexagram, kuzofana nokuhlangana no-Yaojing lapho womile.
詩意:
Le hexagram iwuphawu lomusa nobumnene.
Kukho konke, ukuvumelana kuyinto evamile.
解曰: Izulu nomhlaba kunemizwa. Kuyiqiniso ngampela. UNkulunkulu noBuddha bakuvikela. Ungakhohlwa onakho.
籤詩故事一:
◇URenzong wambona umama wakhe
Isancinza sikaSong Zhenzong, u-Concubine Liu, waba nomona ngokuzala kuka-Concubine Li ukuzalwa kwendodana, u-Zhao Zhen, futhi wafumbathisa umbelethisi ukuze afake ikati le-civet esikhundleni sendodana ka-Concubine Li. Isancinza uLi wamangalelwa ngamanga ngokuzala inunu futhi wehliswa esikhundleni sakhe. isigodlo esibandayo.Isancinza uLiu wakwazi ukugcinwa.
Ngemva kokuba iSancinza uDe ekhushulelwe esikhundleni sokuba yinkosikazi, u-Sancinza uDe washisa isigodlo esibandayo futhi wahlela ukubulala iSancinza uLi. Isancinza uLi saphunyuka futhi sahlala phakathi kwabantu.
Isancinza uLi ekuqaleni wajikijela uZhao Zhen emfuleni, kodwa ngenhlanhla wasindiswa umthenwa futhi wathunyelwa eSigodlweni Sezihlakaniphi Eziyisishiyagalombili. Lapho ekhula, walandela iNgoma Renzong.
Kamuva, u-Bao Zheng (Bao Qingtian) wahlangana neSancinza uLi esiyimpumputhe ngephutha. Lapho efunda iqiniso, waliphenya icala ngentshiseko, futhi ekugcineni iqiniso lavela, okwenza u-Song Renzong abone isancinza uLi njengomama nendodana. Isancinza uLiu waphonswa esigodlweni esibandayo futhi iSancinza uLi samukelwa esigodlweni. Indaba yaphela ngempumelelo.
聖意: Ikhaya nendlu kumnandi ngifisa ingcebo ngifisela izinhlanhla kwezamabhizinisi umshado nomshado amadoda nabahamba ngezinyawo Vimba amasimu Impethu yekwindla inzuzo Izilwane eziyisithupha Izilwane eziyisithupha
